## Covariates

### Elevation

```{r}
# Import elevation raster
elev = rast('prepared/DHM/DHM25.tif')

# Assign correct CRS
crs(elev) = "EPSG:21781"

# Join the elevation data
base::merge(tick, extract(elev, st_transform(tick,crs(elev))))
```
